data.oai_dc:dc: soil fauna, stable isotopes, mesofauna, macrofauna, fatty acids, food web, beechforest, trophic links

Original data comes from a project which takes or took place as part of the DFG priority program "Exploratories for large-scale and long-term functional biodiversity research". The data is stored together with descriptive metadata, in combination called a dataset, in the project repository (https://www.bexis.uni-jena.de). Species information was extracted from that original dataset. The second paragraph is part of the metadata of the original dataset.</br>Changes in soil food web structure of the decomposer system with land use intensity in forest systems|658 occurrences
